events.message: The applicant has submitted a personal loan application to cover medical expenses expected over the next few months.
The loan application was categorized as a Personal Loan due to keywords related to medical treatment and personal expenses.
Assigned a loan officer to the application to oversee the process and facilitate communication with the applicant.
The initial review of the loan application began, checking all submitted information for completeness and accuracy.
Requested additional documents from the applicant including medical bills, proof of income, and identification verification.
The applicant has successfully submitted all requested documents including updated medical reports and income statements.
Completed the credit check to evaluate the applicant’s creditworthiness and repayment capacity for the requested personal loan.
Performed risk assessment considering credit history, loan purpose, and applicant’s financial situation.
Presented the loan offer to the applicant outlining terms, interest rate, and repayment schedule for the personal loan.
Received positive feedback from the applicant expressing agreement with the loan terms and looking forward to proceeding.
The application was escalated to a senior loan officer for final approval due to the loan amount exceeding the standard limit.
The personal loan application was approved after reviewing all documents, credit history, and risk factors.
The approved funds have been transferred to the applicant’s designated bank account according to the agreed schedule.
A follow-up was conducted with the applicant to ensure receipt of funds and satisfaction with the loan process.
The loan application file was closed successfully after confirming all steps were completed and the applicant was satisfied.
